name: Damp Cell
description: You awaken in a cold, damp cell. A rusty iron door stands to the north. The air is thick with the smell of mildew.

name: Guard Post
description: An abandoned guard post. A weapons rack stands against the wall, and a heavy oak door leads east.

name: Great Hall of the Dwarves
description: A vast, pillared hall stretches into darkness. The stone throne of a long-dead king sits at the far end, covered in dust.

name: The Great Forge
description: A colossal, dormant forge dominates the room. An ancient anvil, still warm to the touch, sits in the center. This is a place of power.

name: The Exit Chamber
description: A massive stone gate, sealed by a glowing Magic Boulder, blocks the way to freedom. Two imposing Stone Guardians stand watch.
